feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 01:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
